name: gitguardian
label: GitGuardian
description: Scan your Source Code to detect API Keys, Passwords, Certificates, Encryption Keys and other sensitive data in Real-time.

fields.title: API Key
fields.name: api_key
fields.description: Specify the API Key which you have generated in GitGuardian
fields.tooltip: Your API key can be created and revoked from the API section of your dashboard.

operations.title: List Secret Incidents
operations.description: List secret incidents detected by the GitGuardian dashboard. Occurrences are not returned in this route.
operations.tooltip: List secret incidents detected by the GitGuardian dashboard. Occurrences are not returned in this route.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.title: Cursor
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Pagination Cursor Offset. Cursor is the Data point which is treated as the Centre of the Data List.
parameters.description: Specify the Pagination Cursor offset.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.title: Per Page
parameters.tooltip: Number of items to list per page.By Default per_page is 20.
parameters.description: Number of items to list per page.

parameters.name: date_before
parameters.title: Date Before
parameters.tooltip: Entries found before this date.
parameters.description: Entries found before this date.

parameters.name: date_after
parameters.title: Date After
parameters.tooltip: Entries found after this date.
parameters.description: Entries found after this date.

parameters.name: assignee_email
parameters.title: Assignee Email
parameters.tooltip: Incidents assigned to this email.
parameters.description: Incidents assigned to this email.

parameters.name: assignee_id
parameters.title: Assignee ID
parameters.tooltip: Incidents assigned to this user id.
parameters.description: Incidents assigned to this user id.

parameters.name: status
parameters.title: Status
parameters.tooltip: Filter Incidents with the following status.
parameters.description: Filter Incidents with the following status.

parameters.name: severity
parameters.title: Severity
parameters.tooltip: Filter incidents by severity.
parameters.description: Filter incidents by severity.

parameters.name: validity
parameters.title: Validity
parameters.tooltip: List Secrets with the following validity.
parameters.description: List Secrets with the following validity.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.title: Tags
parameters.tooltip: Incidents with one of the following tags. Use None if you want to filter incidents with no tags.
parameters.description: Incidents with one of the following tags. Use None if you want to filter incidents with no tags.

parameters.name: ordering
parameters.title: Ordering
parameters.tooltip: Sort the results by their field value.
parameters.description: Sort the results by their field value.

parameters.name: detector_group_name
parameters.title: Detector Group Name
parameters.tooltip: Incidents belonging to the specified detector group.
parameters.description: Incidents belonging to the specified detector group.

parameters.name: ignorer_id
parameters.title: Ignorer ID
parameters.tooltip: Incidents ignored by this user id.
parameters.description: Incidents ignored by this user id.

parameters.name: ignorer_api_token_id
parameters.title: Ignorer Api Token ID
parameters.tooltip: Incidents ignored by this API token id.
parameters.description: Incidents ignored by this API token id.

parameters.name: resolver_id
parameters.title: Resolver ID
parameters.tooltip: Incidents resolved by this user id.
parameters.description: Incidents resolved by this user id.

parameters.name: resolver_api_token_id
parameters.title: Resolver Api Token ID
parameters.tooltip: Incidents resolved by this API token id.
parameters.description: Incidents resolved by this API token id.

operations.title: Retrieve a Secret Incident
operations.description: Retrieve secret incident detected by the GitGuardian dashboard with its occurrences.

parameters.name: incident_id
parameters.title: Incident ID
parameters.tooltip: The id of the incident to retrieve
parameters.description: The id of the incident to retrieve

parameters.name: with_occurrences
parameters.title: With Occurrences
parameters.tooltip: Retrieve a number of occurrences of this incident.Defaullt value of With Occurrences is 20.
parameters.description: Retrieve a number of occurrences of this incident.

parameters.name: incident_id
parameters.title: Incident ID
parameters.tooltip: The id of the incident to retrieve
parameters.description: The id of the incident to retrieve

parameters.name: severity
parameters.title: Severity
parameters.tooltip: Specify the severeness of the Incident
parameters.description: Specify the severeness of the Incident

operations.title: Assign a secret incident
operations.description: Assign secret incident detected by the GitGuardian dashboard to a workspace member by email.

parameters.name: incident_id
parameters.title: Incident ID
parameters.tooltip: The id of the incident to retrieve
parameters.description: The id of the incident to retrieve

parameters.name: email
parameters.title: Email
parameters.tooltip: Email of the member to assign.
parameters.description: Email of the member to assign.

parameters.name: member_id
parameters.title: Member ID
parameters.tooltip: ID of the member to assign.
parameters.description: ID of the member to assign.

operations.title: Unassign a secret incident
operations.description: Unassign secret incident from a workspace member by email.

parameters.name: incident_id
parameters.title: Incident ID
parameters.tooltip: The id of the incident to retrieve
parameters.description: The id of the incident to retrieve

operations.title: Resolve a secret incident
operations.description: Resolve a secret incident detected by the GitGuardian dashboard.

parameters.name: secret_revoked
parameters.title: Secret Revoked
parameters.tooltip: Check If want to revoke the Incident
parameters.description: Check If want to revoke the Incident

parameters.name: incident_id
parameters.title: Incident ID
parameters.tooltip: The id of the incident to retrieve
parameters.description: The id of the incident to retrieve

operations.title: Content Scan
operations.description: Scan provided document content for policy breaks.

parameters.name: filename
parameters.title: Filename
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the File
parameters.description: Specify the name of the File

parameters.name: document
parameters.title: Document
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Inner Text of the Document
parameters.description: Specify the Inner Text of the Document

operations.title: List secret occurrences
operations.description: List occurrences of secrets in the monitored perimeter.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.title: Cursor
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Pagination Cursor Offset.
parameters.description: Specify the Pagination Cursor Offset.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.title: Per Page
parameters.tooltip: Number of items to list per page. By Default, The number of Secret Occurrences per_page is 20
parameters.description: Number of items to list per page.

parameters.name: source_id
parameters.title: Source ID
parameters.tooltip: Filter on the source ID.
parameters.description: Filter on the source ID.

parameters.name: source_name
parameters.title: Source Name
parameters.tooltip: Entries matching this source name search.
parameters.description: Entries matching this source name search.

parameters.name: incident_id
parameters.title: Incident ID
parameters.tooltip: Filter by incident ID.
parameters.description: Filter by incident ID.

parameters.name: presence
parameters.title: Presence
parameters.tooltip: Entries that have the following presence status. Use Either 'present' OR 'removed'
parameters.description: Entries that have the following presence status.

parameters.name: author_name
parameters.title: Author Name
parameters.tooltip: Entries matching this author name search. Should have minimum of 3 characters
parameters.description: Entries matching this author name search.

parameters.name: author_info
parameters.title: Author Info
parameters.tooltip: Entries matching this author email search. Should have minimum of 3 characters
parameters.description: Entries matching this author email search.

parameters.name: sha
parameters.title: Sha
parameters.tooltip:
Entries starting with the commit "sha" search id. Should have minimum of 3 characters.

Example: sha=fccebf0562698ab99dc10dcb2e864fc563b25ac4
parameters.description: Entries starting with the commit sha search string.

parameters.name: filepath
parameters.title: Filepath
parameters.tooltip: Entries matching this filepath search. Should have minimum of 3 characters
parameters.description: Entries matching this filepath search.

parameters.name: ordering
parameters.title: Ordering
parameters.tooltip: Sort the results by their field value. The default sort is ASC, DESC if the field is preceded by a '-'
parameters.description: Sort the results by their field value. The default sort is ASC, DESC if the field is preceded by a '-'

parameters.name: date_before
parameters.title: Date Before
parameters.tooltip: Entries found before this date.
parameters.description: Entries found before this date.

parameters.name: date_after
parameters.title: Date After
parameters.tooltip: Entries found after this date.
parameters.description: Entries found after this date.

playbook_collections.name: Sample - GitGuardian - 1.0.0
playbook_collections.description: Sample playbooks for "GitGuardian" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.
